creditline: Purchased with a grant from the Rehael Fund--Roger L. Hale/Eleanor L. Hall of The Minneapolis Foundation
description: blue with red, yellow and orange stripes and off-white zigzags on one side; dark blue knotted pile fiber bands on opposite side; knotted off-white fringe on short sides; 2 red and blue braided ties with 3 tassels on one long side
medium: Wool; weft-faced plain weave with knotted pile
title: Cape (Handira)
